Draft Rating:

C

Rob Hennigan ranks in the 49th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Hennigan's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 2 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Kyle O'Quinn with 49th pick but was worth 8th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Mario Hezonja with 5th pick but was worth 39th pick.
  • Drafted Andrew Nicholson with 19th pick but was worth 48th pick.

Trade Rating:

F

Rob Hennigan ranks in the 4th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Arron Afflalo, Al Harrington, Romero Osby, Dario Šarić, Christian Eyenga, Josh McRoberts, Wesley Iwundu, Maurice Harkless, Nikola Vučević, Landry Shamet to ORL.
  • Lost Jason Richardson to PHI.
  • Lost Earl Clark, Chris Duhon, Dwight Howard to LAL.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Terrence Ross, Anžejs Pasečņiks to ORL.
  • Lost Serge Ibaka to TOR.

Signing Rating:

Their worst signings:
